Taxonomy

Source: R/taxonomy.R
taxonomy.Rd

Taxonomy

taxonomy(genus = NULL, species = NULL, ...)

Arguments

genus, species

(character) genus or species name. pass in either one or both per species). Function will warn if this needs to be increased, otherwise can be left as is.
...

unused; for backwards compatibility only

Examples

taxonomy(genus = "Oreochromis", species = "amphimelas")
#> character(0)
taxonomy(genus = "Oreochromis")
#>  [1] "Oreochromis niloticus"      "Oreochromis mossambicus"   
#>  [3] "Oreochromis aureus"         "Oreochromis macrochir"     
#>  [5] "Oreochromis andersonii"     "Oreochromis leucostictus"  
#>  [7] "Oreochromis mortimeri"      "Oreochromis spilurus"      
#>  [9] "Oreochromis urolepis"       "Oreochromis jipe"          
#> [11] "Oreochromis variabilis"     "Oreochromis esculentus"    
#> [13] "Oreochromis shiranus"       "Oreochromis tanganicae"    
#> [15] "Oreochromis karomo"         "Oreochromis schwebischi"   
#> [17] "Oreochromis korogwe"        "Oreochromis placidus"      
#> [19] "Oreochromis hunteri"        "Oreochromis amphimelas"    
#> [21] "Oreochromis angolensis"     "Oreochromis lepidurus"     
#> [23] "Oreochromis upembae"        "Oreochromis rukwaensis"    
#> [25] "Oreochromis salinicola"     "Oreochromis karongae"      
#> [27] "Oreochromis saka"           "Oreochromis squamipinnis"  
#> [29] "Oreochromis lidole"         "Oreochromis chungruruensis"
#> [31] "Oreochromis mweruensis"     "Oreochromis ismailiaensis" 
taxonomy(species = "amphimelas")
#> character(0)
